long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that creates a button underneath the "share" button on Youtube. This button will copy to your clipboard a link to your youtube video at the current time with one click, instead of making you have to click multiple buttons to share at your current time.
